Package Controller

Class AppointmentModifyController

java.lang.Object
Controller.AppointmentModifyController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AppointmentModifyController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
It used to modify appointment and the error labels check empty fields.
